posts.post_content:
Posted By: Steve C.
Please see the attached link for five raw commons that are duplicates in my collection.  The cards all measure correctly (not trimmed) and are free of paper loss on the back.
  
I'm looking to do simple, one-for-one trades for other T206 raw commons of comparable conditon, but will consider any T206 trade offers.  I can throw in cash if need be.  I prefer the on-field/action poses of major leaguers over the portraits of major leaguers, or any minor/southern leaguers.

E-mail address is sschris@att.net.

Thanks. 

Steve
Chicago, IL

[url]http://s546.photobucket.com/albums/hh412/willworkforT206[/url]/

Posted By: jamie
hey i have a bunch of t206s that I would be looking to trade.. email me at blunder19@aol.com with ones you want
